thread.title: Indonesia Rupiah Tad Weaker After Central Bank Holds Rates
thread.title_full: Indonesia Rupiah Tad Weaker After Central Bank Holds Rates - WSJ

author: Ewen Chew
title: Indonesia Rupiah Tad Weaker After Central Bank Holds Rates
text: 0206 GMT [Dow Jones] Indonesia’s rupiah has fallen against the U.S. dollar Friday, in line with other Asian emerging market currencies, even though the central bank stood firm on monetary policy. Bank Indonesia on Thursday kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged at 7.50%, while hinting that monetary policy easing might be on the cards due to softening inflation levels and an improving current account deficit. The rupiah’s weakening is due to widespread trimming of short-U.S. dollar positions after data shows U.S. core inflation rose and jobless claims fell, tempering the view that U.S. interest rates will stay low...
